mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rxDistrbEnvConf.updateRxDistrbEnvConf */ UPDATE RX_DISTRB_ENV_CONF SET ENV_VAR_NM = #{envVarNm} /* 환경변수명 */ , ENV_VAR_VL = #{envVarVl} /* 환경변수값 */ , VAR_VL_TY_CD = #{varVlTyCd} /* 변수값유형코드 */ , UPDT_DTTM = now() /* 수정일시 */ WHERE SERVC_SEQ = #{servcSeq} /* 서비스SEQ */ AND DISTRB_CONF_ID = #{distrbConfId} /* 배포설정ID */ AND ENV_VAR_NM = #{envVarNm} /* 환경변수명 */
